name: 2D Tank Destroyer
description:
2D Tank Destroyer is an action single-player game where multiple Tanks can shoot and destroy the main Player Tank. All Tanks in 2D Tank Destroyer have a total of 10 Health each including the Player Tank. 2D Tank Destroyer will have 2 perks where one will increase the health of the Player Tank and the other will have a shield ability that will block incoming bullets for several seconds.

WASD: Movement

LeftClick: Player Tank Shoot

Objective: Score 16 points to win but if you lose all your health. you will lose the game
